Key Match Events: Meschack Elia gave DRC the lead when he headed in virtually on the goalline
Mostafa Mohamed scored his fourth goal of the tournament from the penalty spot on the stroke of half-time
Mohamed Hamdy received a red card in extra time
Post-Match Reflections: Mohamed Abou Gabal missed his penalty in the shootout as the record seven-times winners Egypt bowed out at the Laurent Pokou Stadium
Miscellaneous Highlights: As a result, Mohamed Salah will remain with Liverpool and not have to return to Ivory Coast as he continues to recover from a hamstring injury
Others: The Egypt midfielder Mohamed Hamdy received a red card in extra time
The Pharaohs, without injured talisman Salah, stopped attacking and held on as the game went to a shootout
